text:
'There's no #Vaccine for #Poverty & #Inequality. Health cannot be seen as a product for prosperous nations alone. #COVID19 highlighted why #UHC is so important. We must put an emphasis on promoting #HealthForAll.' @DrTedros @WHO  at #AHAIC2021 opening ceremony.
